Index >  PDFKeywords

PDFKeywords

Description

Returns or sets the keywords associated with the PDF document.

Data type

<string>

Syntax

.PDFKeywords = 'Keyword'.;

Remarks

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

PDFTitle
PDFAuthor
PDFSubject
PDFCreationDate
PDFModifiedDate
PDFCreator
PDFProducer
